name: ARMY TRANSPORTATION MUSEUM FOUNDATION
description: History of the Army's Transportation Corps from the Revolution to modern armored vehicles
sampleDescriptions: U.S. Army Center of Military History plans to close 19 Army museums located on active Army military installations.
Keep the U.S. Army Transportation Museum at Fort Eustis, Virginia open while the U.S. Army Center of Military History decides if and how it will close / consolidate Army museums.
